name: phpperftools/collector
description: Library for collecting and storing XHProf/uprofiler/tideway results for later use by PhpPerfTools/Gui.

suggest.ext-xhprof: You need to install either xhprof, uprofiler or tideway to use PhpPerfTools/Gui.
suggest.ext-uprofiler: You need to install either xhprof, uprofiler or tideway to use PhpPerfTools/Gui.
suggest.ext-tideway: You need to install either xhprof, uprofiler or tideway to use PhpPerfTools/Gui.
suggest.ext-mongo: Mongo is needed to store profiler results for PHP < 7.
suggest.ext-mongodb: Mongo is needed to store profiler results for PHP > 7.
suggest.ext-curl: You need to install the curl extension to upload saved files
suggest.ext-json: You need json extension to work with json on some linux systems
suggest.ext-pdo: You need pdo extension with correct database driver loaded to work with PDO
suggest.alcaeus/mongo-php-adapter: Mongo PHP Adapter is required for PHP >7 (when using ext-mongodb)
